team27.healthe.controllers

Class OfflineController

  • java.lang.Object
    • team27.healthe.controllers.OfflineController

  • public class OfflineController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the saving of information when the user is offline and updates the database when the user goes back online Using JSON
    Author:
    Chase
